Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.tactik.game.Entity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(float posX,
      float posY,
      int sizeX,
      int sizeY,
      boolean isWalkable,
      java.lang.String path,
      int current,
      int id)
        This is the constructor of entity.
        Parameters:
        posX - This is the x position of the entity.
        posY - This is the y position of the entity.
        sizeX - This is the x size of the entity.
        sizeY - This is the y size of the entity.
        isWalkable - Indicate if the player can walk of the entity.
        textures - This is the texture of the entity. This is a vector because an entity can have several textures like the player.
